input_text:
Job Title: Production Supervisor

Location: Wayne County, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Manufacturing, Production

Description:
Large Food manufacturing company in Mt. Olive NC is looking for a strong Production Supervisor on the 3rd shift. 
Looking for someone who is strong with leading a team and helping reach production goals. Looking for someone in the food manufacturing space as well. 
SALARY: $65k-$70k Salary
Hours: 5:30pm-3am

Key Functions Assures all employee safety, food safety and food quality rules and regulations are followed. Communicates the same to employees. Assures all employees are properly trained and are performing their duties in these areas.Monitors adherence to and assures compliance with “Standard Operating Procedures” (SOP’s) and “Good Manufacturing Practices.”Supervises and coordinates all departmental activities prior to beginning of each shift to ensure “on-schedule” start-ups.Assigns job tasks to departmental employees as dictated by day-to-day production requirements.Utilizes machinery and personnel to get maximum production and efficiency for each production run. Works to reduce and eliminate all sources of waste including raw materials, time, and equipment failures. Evaluates performance and quality of product all during the run.Monitors conditions of all equipment in assigned department. Writes work requests for repairs, needed changes, or additions.If applicable, maintains departmental forklift data daily. Assures all forklifts are in working order. Reviews and turns in forklift checklists daily.Coordinates work activities with other departments of Company. Works closely with other supervisors to avoid confusion, misunderstandings and resulting downtime.Meets regularly with Superintendent to discuss problems, opportunities, schedules, safety conditions, etc.Reviews departmental reports for accuracy, completeness, and promptness.Accountable for results in terms of costs, budgets, methods, safety, quantity, and quality of production, operations and personnel.Maintains and updates a variety of relevant reports and spreadsheets on computer. Maintains computer and paper files as needed.Maintains areas of operation in a safe and sanitary manner. Makes effective use of and makes recommendations on physical assets. Determines that established safety rules, Company policy and good housekeeping are followed.(CAPPING/PASTEURIZING ONLY) In the event of this employee’s absence, supervisory duties related to food safety and food quality will be assumed by the Production Superintendent.
Other Duties May perform some duties of subordinates or other Production Supervisors in absence of same.May occasionally operate forklift in performance of some job duties.Occasionally drives own or company vehicle in performance of some job duties.Ensures proper selection, training, evaluation, and discipline of and communication with employees.Participates in training, employee meetings, committees, project teams, etc. as appropriate.Receives written and verbal instructions on the above job tasks and performs other duties as directed by Supervisor.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
